name: Battle Snakes
description:
Battle Snakes is a 2-4 player local multiplayer arcade game where you compete in different arenas to be the last snake standing. Can you out-slither your friends and slide your way to the top as the supreme snake?

  • 2-4 players on the same keyboard
  • Simple, beginner friendly controls
  • 6 powerful powerups
  • Collect food to gain points and increase your length
  • Short rounds with quick restarts
  • 12 unique maps
